text: thumb The belly harp is a musical instrument found in West Africa (including Nigeria and Liberia) which is a musical bow with a gourd resonator which is held against the body.https://www.google.com/books/edition/Liberian_educational_and_cultural_materi/cHUrAQAAIAAJ?hl=en&gbpv;=1&bsq;=%22belly+harp%22+liberia&dq;=%22belly+harp%22+liberia&printsec;=frontcover ==Recordings== * Belly Harp. Folk Music of Liberia, Folkways FE 4465 (Side ll, band 3)https://www.google.com/books/edition/Development_of_materials_for_a_one_year/JwxYAAAAMAAJ?hl=en&gbpv;=1&bsq;=%22belly+harp%22+liberia&dq;=%22belly+harp%22+liberia&printsec;=frontcover ==References== Category:Liberian music Category:Harps Category:African musical instruments
title: Belly harp
